title: 2026 Association Tournament Registration Open
author: GFCBA Staff
excerpt: Registration is now open for the 2026 Greater Fox Cities BA Championship Tournament. Don't miss your chance to compete!
content: We're excited to announce that registration is now open for our annual championship tournament. This year's event will be held at High Rollers Bowl on March 15-16, 2026. Early bird registration discounts are available until February 15th. Visit our tournaments page for more information and to register online.
